entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 22. POP 40%
entry.summary: Clear early this evening then partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 15. POP 40%
